reviewText: This is what is says it is--a highlight video.  Considering the price (over 20 bucks) I was surprised the production value wasn't a little better.  Most of the highlights are taken from ground level, and in most cases they don't use the shots from those who televised games.  The Pitt game and Sugar Bowl are a little better than some of the others.  If you really want a keepsake of the season, this is pretty good--esp. if you like to see some behind the scenes stuff.  But if not, pass on it.
